text: L'euthanasie devrait être légale.
Il ne devrait pas y avoir de politiciens.
Property shouldn't be held by few select individuals.
Il est important de respecter la religion.
Tout activité sexuelle est tolérable si tout le monde impliqué est adulte et consentant.
Independent websites should not be required to tolerate content that violates their policy.
Il est déplorable que des syndicats forcent des travailleurs à faire la grève.
Il serait dommage de voir les languages minoritaires disparaître.
Il n'est pas sain pour les enfants d'être élevés par des parents homosexuels.
Les travailleurs du monde entier méritent d'être libérés du capitalisme.
The right to start a business is fundamental to any thriving economy.
Physical violence should be used against those who oppose my views.
Les travailleurs devraient pouvoir en décider plus sur la production.
Les employés essentiels ne devraient pas avoir le droit de faire la grève.
Les gouvernement locaux devraient avoir plus de pouvoir que le gouvernement central.
Nations thrive when presided over by strong capable governments.
Toute hiéarchie devrait être abolie.
Les régulations sont à haut risque de nuire plutôt que de protéger les personnes visées.
La société devrait accepter le multiculturalisme.
L'aide sociale aux handicapés devrait être réduite.
La société devrait s'unir sous un autorité centrale pour plus de cohésion.
Women are naturally more nurturing than men.
Eugenics should be used to genetically remove disabled individuals.
La nation passe avant tout.
Eradicating diseases isn't a valid reason to enforce vaccination.
People are whatever gender they say they are.
Le pouvoir devrait être transmis de manière héréditaire.
Le revenu universel de base est supérieur aux autres formes d'aide sociale.
If people want to live unhealthy lifestyles, it is their right to do so.
Parfois, la justice interpersonelle est justifiée.
We should replace the central bank with alternate credit forms, such as free banking.
Avoir l'égalité entre l'homme et la femme est désirable.
With open borders come major economic benefits.
L'impôt sur le revenu devrait être aboli.
Les propriétaires terriens donnent un service essentiel.
Gathering of personal data by companies is legitimate.
Certaines orientations sexuelles devraient être favorisées socialement.
Le peuple ne peut se gouverner par lui-même.
Nos ressources naturelles n'appartiennent pas au capital étranger.
Nous ne devrions pas nous engager dans des guerres offensives.
Les conseils locaux devraient avoir plus de pouvoir d'implémenter des politiques économiques.
Altering our language to make it more gender-inclusive is not a bad idea.
La vie sans l'état serait pénible, brute et courte.
Nous ne devrions pas laisser les gens faire des choses dangereuses pour eux-mêmes.
Tout le monde devrait avoir accès à un emploi.
People should be allowed to use their terrain however they please.
Abandoned property should be free to use by any individual.
Gender should be abolished.
An individual’s gender is determined by their chromosomes.
We should increase tariffs on imports in order to help local producers.
It’s wasteful to have so many different brands of the same good.
Workplaces should not be required to close on Sundays or during religious festivals.
La propriété intellectuelle est légitime.
La compétition pousse à l'innovation.
La liberté d'expression est vitale pour une société saine.
Les bénéfices de l'automation surpassent les coûts.
Les travailleurs devraient saisir les moyens de production.
Using artificial intelligence to better plan production is worth investigating.
S'introduire sur le terrain d'autrui devrait être puni durement.
It is better for different peoples to stay in their own communities.
Like-minded individuals should form self-governing communities.
Nous ne devrions pas tenter de changer la nature.
Les frontières internationales ne devraient pas exister.
Les hommes font de meilleurs chefs que les femmes.
A party of revolutionaries should lead the workers against capitalism.
Equality of opportunity is a must-have.
Workers deserve a greater part of what they create.
Theft can never be justified.
We should move beyond wage systems.
Certain ethnic groups are genetically predisposed to violence.
We should be skeptical of new technologies.
Taxes should exist on harmful products to discourage their consumption.
Political correctness has gone too far.
Founding offshore platform countries is a legitimate practice.
We should combat mindless consumerism.
An individual can never be truly separate from society.
Nothing is sacred, and we should embrace this.
Industrial capitalism was a great improvement for humanity.
Governmental surveillance is an unnecessary evil.
Gay marriage should be legal.
Monarchy is an outdated form of government.
Bosses know what's best for their workers.
A singular world government is desirable.
Firearms should be available to the general public.
Equal representation of genders should be mandatory in workplaces.
Pornography should be banned.
Many industries are too important to be left to the market.
Tyranny by majority is a legitimate concern.
Expertise, not popular approval, represents best the worth of a ruler.
People should not have to pay for healthcare.
Workers should be encouraged to form cooperatives on their own.
Not questioning authority is good if it ensures stability.
The worst criminals should be publicly executed.
The prices of goods should be set by the market.
It’s often necessary to break taboos.
Space travel should not be funded by tax money.
Employers should have the duty to fire workers who engage in internalized discrimination.
Wealth accumulation leads to the creation of an oppressive class system.
Deportation should be used to ensure ethnic homogeneity.
The wealth disparity between different cultural groups is due to some groups working harder.
In times of crisis, safety takes precedence over liberty.
Life in big cities is unfulfilling.
Nature has no inherent value.
Eminent domain is needed to ensure ethical and efficient usage of land.
Hate speech against minorities should be a crime.
Discrimination against obese people is unacceptable.
Subsidies should be given to agrarian producers and those who wish to become ones.
Parents should not send their children to religious schools.
The state should control all aspects of the economy.
People should not be treated differently because of their origin.
Feudalism was not such a bad system.
Nomadic cultures have a wiser relationship with the land than we do.
There should be laws against wearing religious clothing in public.
Les syndicats nuisent à tout le monde.
Some ideas are too dangerous to be given a platform.
There is no reason why children should stay with their biological parents.
A large welfare state breeds an unhealthy culture of reliance.
In the future we should improve our own biology with technology.
My culture is worth protecting.
Traditional gender roles are necessary.
There should be certain rules and standards that apply across all of society.
If it is tradition to perform some surgeries on babies, it should be done.
In an ideal society, money would not exist.
All government intervention in the economy should be opposed.
No one but me can adequately represent my political views.
Prostitution should be allowed.
All drugs should be decriminalised.
Inheritance should be abolished.
We should return to a simpler, less materialistic way of living.
If someone is first to claim an area of land, they are entitled to profit from it.
An individual should be allowed to do whatever they want with their body.
There are moral rules which should never be broken.
